name: Queen Nayele
summary: Queen of the Ipadora Kingdom. Head of House Nereval. Ascended in 996 ACC. Genuinely compassionate â€” not as a political style but as a sincere orientation toward the world. Has restructured Ipadora's waterway tax system and expanded the Ipadora Justice System's continental reputation. Appointed her brother Prince Vaelen to govern Glaril upon taking power.
